posts.post_content:
I deleted the cards that were sold in the listing and lowered prices on all cards still available.

If you need better scans please let me know.   PM or Email if interested.  

All cards include postage.   Hope you find some you need.  I've owned these since about 1980.   thanks    -peter.  


Elberfield (fielding) no creases.  Stain on part of back - $25
Knight - vg $20
Lake $20
Parent $20
Rhodes (st. L port) $22 vg+
Snodgrass 2 (catching) heavier creases $22
Tannehill  - Wash.    Huge top border.  Crease top to nearly bottom.  $20
White - Polar Bear - paper loss on front, otherwise really sharp.  $30
Williams $20
Delehanty - trimmed top, right, bottom otherwise no creases in card.  $25/B]

Hey guys  - cards in bold still available.

thanks for looking.

peter

Hi Peter,
Nice cards, email sent on Manning and Gray.
Thanks,
Rick.

Bump City.

20 have sold.  10 left.  see list in top of thread and thanks

peter

Hi Peter,
Cards safely arrived, i really appreciate it.  Also a well-deserved bump!  Thanks again,
Rick.
